predicate.note: Frames file for 'whipsaw' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry at the moment, and I'm not even entirely certain of the meaning. Syntax is pretty straightforward, though.

example.name: active
example.text: Political and currency gyrations can whipsaw the funds.

example.name: passive
example.text: After *trace* being whipsawed *trace* by a volatile stock market, Treasury bonds closed higher.
